mapper.sql: id, operate_user_id, operate_user, operation, login_ip, create_time,extra
mapper.insert: insert into log(id, operate_user_id, operate_user, operation, login_ip, create_time,extra) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{extra,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
